summary: The module showcases a complete workflow for training and evaluating a Scalable Inception Graph Neural Network (SIGN) on large‑scale graph datasets. It includes utilities to load graph data, convert it into PyTorch tensors, define a simple feed‑forward network wrapped as a graph model, and run training and testing loops, serving as a reference implementation for node classification tasks.
business_intent: Provide developers and researchers with a ready‑to‑run example that reproduces SIGN results on benchmark datasets, facilitating adoption of the method and enabling quick experimentation with scalable GNN architectures in production or research pipelines.
